alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 16 at 3:30PM EDT until August 16 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Thomas County in south central Georgia... Northern Brooks County in south central Georgia... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 330 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Boston, or 9 miles east of Thomasville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Thomasville, Pavo, Morven, Barwick, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Barney, Dillon, Hollis, Newark, Patten, Eason and Oaklawn. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
